messages.title: Supporting our communities
messages.content: I will voice the desperate need for affordable housing solutions across Erewash and for the required care and support for all residents in need.

messages.title: The ONLY consistent opposition to HS2
messages.content: The £50 billion plus pricetag should be spent improving our existing rail network and benefit everyone. I will push for cleaner, greener public transport for all.

messages.title: Protecting our Green belt
messages.content: With fracking and D2N2 plans threatening to permanently destroy our wildlife and beloved green spaces, I will make a stand for all Erewash residents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Voice the desperate need for affordable housing solutions across Erewash.
Provide the required care and support for all residents in need.
Oppose the £50 billion HS2 project and push for improvements to the existing rail network.
Stand against fracking and D2N2 plans that threaten wildlife and green spaces.

issues.environment: With fracking and D2N2 plans threatening to permanently destroy our wildlife and beloved green spaces, I will make a stand for all Erewash residents.
issues.transport: The £50 billion plus pricetag should be spent improving our existing rail network and benefit everyone. I will push for cleaner, greener public transport for all.
